channel.title: Npm on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Npm on Today I Learned

item.description: That there’s a npm outdated command that finds packages which are not at their most recent versions! Example: npm outdated --global # Package Current Wanted Latest Location # n 7.5.0 7.5.0 9.0.0 global # npm 6.14.15 6.14.17 8.15.0 global # pnpm 6.15.2 6.33.1 7.6.0 global # yarn 1.22.11 1.22.19 1.22.19 global
